subject: Olympic Games
Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
Television
lead_paragraph: On Sept. 4, 1972, the day Mark Spitz won his seventh gold medal at the Munich Games, there were no underwater cameras, no super-slow-motion replays and no sideline reporters.
snippet: On Sept. 4, 1972, the day Mark Spitz won his seventh gold medal at the Munich Games, there were no underwater cameras, no super-slow-motion replays and no sideline reporters.
